examples.example: 我会马上投入到新的工作任务中，充满干劲。

translate.english: I will immediately devote myself to the new work task and be full of energy.

examples.example: 看到需要帮助的人，他马上伸出援手。

translate.english: When seeing people in need, he immediately offers a helping hand.

examples.example: 听到好消息后，我马上开心地笑了起来。

translate.english: After hearing the good news, I immediately laughed happily.
